page.title: 02WHETSTONE
page.content: Victoria Road is the main street in Whetstone.There are a few shops,houses and some pubs.Behind Victoria Road there is a lot of houses,some modern and some old.It is a quiet place.There are only two bus stops.There are no doctors or dentists in Whetstone. Whetstone looks a bit dull.There are quite a few factories,but not much else. We asked a few locals about what they thought of their village,and most were dissatisfied with the facilities there were.Many of the inhabitants use the large neighbouring village of Blaby for shopping.
